scenes.action_text: ABSOLUTE POWER Written by WILLIAM GOLDMAN Based on the book by DAVID BALDACCI May 1996 Draft FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY FADE IN: 1 INT. WASHINGTON MUSEUM - DAY 1 The saddest eyes you ever saw. We are looking at an El Greco drawing. It is a study for one of his paintings. PULL BACK TO REVEAL -- A bunch of art students are doing sketches of the eyes, the elongated finger
